scripts.test: pnpm run test:frontend && pnpm run test:backend
scripts.dev: pnpm run dev:frontend & pnpm run dev:backend
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:frontend && pnpm run lint:backend
scripts.docker:local:up: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml --profile local up --build -d
scripts.docker:local:up:monitoring: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml --profile local --profile monitoring up --build -d
scripts.docker:local:up:fe-prod: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.fe-prod.yml --profile local up --build -d
scripts.docker:local:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml --profile local --profile monitoring down
scripts.docker:local:logs: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml --profile local logs -f
scripts.docker:local:clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml --profile local --profile monitoring down -v
scripts.db:migrate:local: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL pnpm --filter backend prisma migrate dev'
scripts.db:generate:local: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL pnpm --filter backend prisma generate'
scripts.db:seed:local: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL pnpm --filter backend prisma db seed'
scripts.db:reset:local: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL pnpm --filter backend prisma migrate reset --force'
scripts.db:studio:local: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL pnpm --filter backend prisma studio'
scripts.k6:reset: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL pnpm --filter backend exec tsx ../k6/scripts/reset-load-test.ts'
scripts.k6:competition: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL pnpm --filter backend exec tsx ../k6/scripts/setup-load-test.ts' && K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:9090/api/v1/write k6 run -o experimental-prometheus-rw -e K6_ENV=local -e SCENARIO=competition -e EVENT_ID=100 -e SLOT_ID=100 -e TEST_ID=competition-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) k6/tests/reservation-load.js
scripts.k6:stress: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL USER_COUNT=5000 pnpm --filter backend exec tsx ../k6/scripts/setup-load-test.ts' && K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:9090/api/v1/write k6 run -o experimental-prometheus-rw -e K6_ENV=local -e SCENARIO=stress -e EVENT_ID=100 -e SLOT_ID=100 -e TEST_ID=stress-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) k6/tests/reservation-load.js
scripts.k6:spike: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL USER_COUNT=10000 pnpm --filter backend exec tsx ../k6/scripts/setup-load-test.ts' && K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:9090/api/v1/write k6 run -o experimental-prometheus-rw -e K6_ENV=local -e SCENARIO=spike -e EVENT_ID=100 -e SLOT_ID=100 -e TEST_ID=spike-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) k6/tests/reservation-load.js
scripts.k6:team: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL EVENT_ID=102 pnpm --filter backend exec tsx ../k6/scripts/setup-load-test.ts' && K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:9090/api/v1/write k6 run -o experimental-prometheus-rw -e K6_ENV=local -e SCENARIO=competition -e EVENT_ID=102 -e SLOT_ID=102 -e TEST_ID=team-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) k6/tests/reservation-load.js
scripts.k6:logic: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL pnpm --filter backend exec tsx ../k6/scripts/setup-load-test.ts' && K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:9090/api/v1/write k6 run -o experimental-prometheus-rw -e K6_ENV=local -e EVENT_ID=100 -e SLOT_ID=100 -e TEST_ID=logic-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) k6/tests/reservation-scenarios.js
scripts.k6:logic:team: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL EVENT_ID=102 pnpm --filter backend exec tsx ../k6/scripts/setup-load-test.ts' && K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:9090/api/v1/write k6 run -o experimental-prometheus-rw -e K6_ENV=local -e EVENT_ID=102 -e SLOT_ID=102 -e TEST_ID=logic-team-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) k6/tests/reservation-scenarios.js
scripts.k6:queue: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL SKIP_QUEUE_TOKENS=true pnpm --filter backend exec tsx ../k6/scripts/setup-load-test.ts' && K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:9090/api/v1/write k6 run -o experimental-prometheus-rw -e K6_ENV=local -e SCENARIO=competition -e EVENT_ID=100 -e TEST_ID=queue-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) k6/tests/queue-load.js
scripts.k6:queue:stress: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL USER_COUNT=5000 SKIP_QUEUE_TOKENS=true pnpm --filter backend exec tsx ../k6/scripts/setup-load-test.ts' && K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:9090/api/v1/write k6 run -o experimental-prometheus-rw -e K6_ENV=local -e SCENARIO=stress -e EVENT_ID=100 -e TEST_ID=queue-stress-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) k6/tests/queue-load.js
scripts.k6:queue:spike: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL USER_COUNT=10000 SKIP_QUEUE_TOKENS=true pnpm --filter backend exec tsx ../k6/scripts/setup-load-test.ts' && K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:9090/api/v1/write k6 run -o experimental-prometheus-rw -e K6_ENV=local -e SCENARIO=spike -e EVENT_ID=100 -e TEST_ID=queue-spike-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) k6/tests/queue-load.js
scripts.k6:queue:logic: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL_LOCAL SKIP_QUEUE_TOKENS=true pnpm --filter backend exec tsx ../k6/scripts/setup-load-test.ts' && K6_PROMETHEUS_RW_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:9090/api/v1/write k6 run -o experimental-prometheus-rw -e K6_ENV=local -e EVENT_ID=100 -e SLOT_ID=100 -e TEST_ID=queue-logic-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) k6/tests/queue-scenarios.js
